experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: ‚Ä¢      Formulated a Propensity to Book model: Identifying customers having a high probability to make a booking  ‚Ä¢	Conducted market segmentation and cataloged target customer base by collating & analyzing the booking data of 20 lakh+ base users ‚Ä¢	Realized a revenue increment of 140% by targeting the top decile users forecasted by the model through relevant business campaigns ‚Ä¢	Upscaled the daily average users on all platforms by 56.7% by leveraging the out of sample model implementation results on target users‚Ä¢	Registered a 6.35x lift in the monthly predicted bookings and top one percentile accuracy of 81% by conducting top decile drill down
experience.description_html: ‚Ä¢ Formulated a Propensity to Book model: Identifying customers having a high probability to make a booking ‚Ä¢ Conducted market segmentation and cataloged target customer base by collating & analyzing the booking data of 20 lakh+ base users ‚Ä¢ Realized a revenue increment of 140% by targeting the top decile users forecasted by the model through relevant business campaigns ‚Ä¢ Upscaled the daily average users on all platforms by 56.7% by leveraging the out of sample model implementation results on target users‚Ä¢ Registered a 6.35x lift in the monthly predicted bookings and top one percentile accuracy of 81% by conducting top decile drill down

experience.title: Student Member
experience.description: Working under the Dean of Alumni Affairs and International Relations, Team Students' Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and its alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute.We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Regional Student-Alumni Meet, Guest Lectures and carry on programmes like the Student Alumni Mentorship to meet our objective
experience.description_html: Working under the Dean of Alumni Affairs and International Relations, Team Students' Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and its alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute.We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Regional Student-Alumni Meet, Guest Lectures and carry on programmes like the Student Alumni Mentorship to meet our objective

recommendations: Sambit Kumar Dash ‚ÄúAnmol showed exemplary organising skills in planning and executing the alumni reunion held at the beginning of 2020. This event was attended by more than 150 attendees from various alumni batches, joining from India and from various other locations globally. She liaisoned with various internal and external contributors, that ensured as guests we felt seamless experience in handling of the invitation and registration process, logistics of transportation and accommodation, and delivering the event agenda over a packed three day schedule. The entire event ran like clockwork and the entire visiting alumni group provided feedback that this was one of the best events that most of us had experienced recently. Kudos to Anmol specifically and the overall Student Alumni Committee for their contribution in delivering an excellent event experience.‚Äù

volunteer_experience.info: Served as a volunteer in National Service Scheme (NSS), IIT Kharagpur (2018-20). Worked for the welfare of the local residents of the village Maalma & was involved in activities like teaching, awareness rallies, road construction, surveys, etc. Also attended the NSS Annual Winter Camp 2018 and leaded a    group of 33 volunteers to successfully conduct activities like road repairing, first-aid training, clothes distribution, rallies, surveys and street plays.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: National Service Scheme
volunteer_experience.title: Volunteer
